item.description:
This meetup is being organized by Megan.

Come out for some latin dancing at Ryles Jazz Club. If you make it before 10pm, there's no cover. And the music is always fantastic!

From their website:

Viernes de Vacilon Latin Dance Party!

Join us every Friday for Viernes de Vacilon, a Latin dance party that's Hot, Hot, Hot! Rotating DJs keep you dancing to the best Bachata, Merengue, Reggaeton, and Salsa till 2 am. Monthly dance shows.
Cover is FREE before 10 pm, $5 before 11 pm, and $10 after 11 pm (except for special events). Tasteful attire required. 18+

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Latin dancing at Ryles!
